CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - Cotacoes__r.CreatedDate), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - Cotacoes__r.CreatedDate), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT(CreatedDate - Cotacoes__r.CreatedDate), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - Cotacoes__r.CreatedDate) , 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) )
CustomField.label: TESTE
